ygData.subject: SV: Making spyglasses and gaining points in tinker (76 now)
ygData.msgSnippet: Whats wrong with this skill is that i tried to make collapsible fishing poles and i failed more times then i made one about 6 out of 10. WTF is that the damn
ygData.messageBody:
Whats wrong with this skill is that i tried to make collapsible fishing poles and i failed more times then i made one about 6 out of 10. WTF is that the damn pole is trivial and still i fail so much in making them.

Anyone else have the same problem ?



Askur Wizzie of Veeshan


----- Original Message -----
From: <sragan@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 6:50 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Making spyglasses and gaining points in tinker (76 now)


> From: sragan@...
>
> Hello Folks,
>
> Fizz here, been a while.
>
> I have been making spyglasses, failing about one out of every 3, but am able to make a profit selling them for 60 plat or so. There are enough folks on my server that are 40+ that consider 60 plat chump change. My rule of thumb is I charge twice the component cost (or however much I can get for them...heh)
>
> I got my first point since Cams became trivial at 75... I'm at 76 now. Its haaaard gaining points tho. I have made 10 spyglasses without a point gain, but if I can make a bit of profit at it, I can support the habit without going broke.
>
> To make a profit, ya gotta have some stuff that gets your charisma up.
>
> Cheers,
>
> "FizzWizz of Tunare"
>
>
